name: Nova 3D
description:
Explore Nova's cabin from the world of Terra Nova... in 3D!

WASD to move Mouse to look Space to jump Shift to run RMB to zoom

Created in July 2020 during the second Imagining Indigenous Worlds with Unity Skins Video Game Workshop hosted in partnership with the Initiative for Indigenous Futures (IIF) and Western Arctic Moving Picutures (WAMP).

Music by AShamaluevMusic (SoundCloud)

FPS Controller by VeryHotShark (GitHub)

Assets by Synty Store (Synty Store) and more...
